recommendations.title: Build Emergency Foundation Before Debt Attack - Consolidate MBA Education Loan and Personal Loan
recommendations.description: Creating an emergency fund of $1,000 to $2,500 will prevent backsliding during unexpected expenses. Consolidating the MBA Education Loan and Personal Loan into a lower-interest loan will save 10.5% in interest per annum and reduce the monthly payment burden.

recommendations.title: Prioritize the High-Interest HDFC Credit Card Debt While Building Psychological Momentum
recommendations.description: Paying more than the minimum payment on the HDFC Credit Card will tackle the highest-interest debt first while creating psychological momentum. Automate the credit card payment and consider a balance transfer to a lower-interest card. Focus on making progress rather than perfection.
